cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY' S GOVERNMENT. )SECRET.Meeting of Ministers and others held at no. 10; Downing Street, on TUESDAY, the6TH APRIL, 1943, at 5.30 p.m.PRESENT;The Rt. Hon. WinstPrime Minister.The Rt, Hon. Viscount Simon,Lord Chancellor.The Rt. Hon. Sir Andrew Duncan,M.P., Minister of Supply.The Rt. Hon. Ernest Brown, M.P. ,Minister of Health.The Rt. Hon. Lord Leathers,Minister of War Transport.The Rt. Hon. Sir William Jowitt,M.P. t Minister without Portfolio.Major The Rt. Hon. G. Lloyd George,M.P., Minister of Fuel and Power.The Rt. Hon. The Earl of Selborne,Minister of Economic Warfare.The Rt. Hon. Lord Cherwell,Paymaster-General.The Rt. Hon. Sir Walter Womersley,M.P., Minister of Pensions.i S. Churchill, M.P. ,(In the Chair).Col. The Rt. Hon. Oliver Stanley,Secretary of State for theColonies.The Rt. Hon. Hugh Dalton, M.P.,President of the Board of Trade.The Rt. Hon. R.S. Hudson, M.P.,Minister of Agriculture andFisheries.The Rt. Hon. Lord Woolton,Minister of Food.The Rt, Hon. Lord Portal,Minister of Works and Planning.The Rt. Hon. Duff Cooper, M.P.,Chancellor of the Duchy of lancaster.The Rt. Hon. W.S. Morrison, M.P.,Minister of Town and country planning.Capt. The Rt. Hon. Harry CrookshankM.P., Postmaster-General.The Rt. Hon. James Stuart, M.P.,Joint Parliamentary Seeretary tothe; Treasury.The Rt. Hon. W. Whit-el ey, M.P.,Joint Parliamentary Secretaryto the Treasury.
